metadata.title: CVE-2020-17380 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer overflow was found in QEMU through 5.0.0 in the SDHCI device emulation support. It could occur while doing a multi block SDMA transfer via the sdhci_sdma_transfer_multi_blocks() routine in hw/sd/sdhci.c. A guest user or process could use this flaw to crash the QEMU process on the host, resulting in a denial of service condition, or potentially execute arbitrary code with privileges of the QEMU process on the host.

notes.note: mdeslaur> see if there are other relevant commits

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:5.2+dfsg-2ubuntu1').
